name: Super Buckyball Tournament Preseason
description:
As a standalone version separate from Super Buckyball Tournament, the Preseason gives players a chance to experience SBT for a few weeks before the expected launch in 2021, as well as give us valuable feedback for balancing and making the game even more fun!

Key Features:

Each game is fresh and exhilarating due to the real-time physics-based core play and strong variety of tools and characters available for you to forge your own personal playstyle. In each 6-minute match you will face new and constantly shifting challenges as your opponents employ innumerable possible strategies against you!


Character Abilities:
In Super Buckyball Tournament Preseason, each of the 7 characters is paired with a toolkit of unique abilities and a powerful ultimate move that can be adapted for use on both attack & defense.



Team-Play Enhancement:
Coordinate advanced teamplay maneuvers with an assisted passing system that allows players to pass the ball to teammates across the field with the press of a single button.



In-Game Items:
Plenty of in-game items can be found across the arena to give clever players an edge right when they need it most!



Arcade game modes:
Blow off some steam and relax in our Dodgeball and Mayhem modes when you’ve had enough spirit of competition!



Season Pass:
Yes that’s right, the preseason has its very own season pass! It has 60 levels with cool rewards all the way to the top!



Disclaimer:
The preseason is available from November 19th until December 6th. After the Preseason has ended, we will close the servers and all player data will be reset.

We welcome all players to act as members of our development team and experience the game as it is being developed; we will do our best to make adjustments according to your suggestions. All feedback can be directed to our email: sbt@pathea.net
